bio:treatment.description: Pedicels appressed or diverging to 20° from the branch axes. Anthers 0.2-0.4 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Eragrostis pectinacea var. pectinacea grows through¬out the range of the species, including most of the contiguous United States. Within the Flora region, it is most common in the eastern states and usually flowers from July-November.
